destination.description: The target Region or Availability Zone that the metric subscription is enabled for. For example, `eu-west-1`.

metric.description: The metric used for the enabled subscription. Valid values: `aggregate-latency`. Default: `aggregate-latency`.

period.description: The data aggregation time for the subscription.

source.description: The source Region or Availability Zone that the metric subscription is enabled for. For example, `us-east-1`.

statistic.description: The statistic used for the enabled subscription. Valid values: `p50`. Default: `p50`.
